dcterms:description: The MSCOCO 2015 dataset is used for image captioning, specifically employing the Karpathy configuration which includes 110K images for training and 5K images each for validation and test. Each image has 5 human caption annotations.
dcterms:title: MSCOCO 2015 dataset
